description: Detects log entries that appear in exploitation attempts against MS Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321 Author: Florian Roth, @testanull. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Unknown, please report false positives via https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/issues
name: Possible Exploitation of Exchange RCE CVE-2021-42321
query: (winlog.event_id:("6" OR "8") AND (*Cmdlet\ failed.\ Cmdlet\ Get\-App,\ * OR *Task\ Get\-App\ throwing\ unhandled\ exception\:\ System.InvalidCastException\:*))
